This is the orientation learning module for PSYC 2530. There will be a total of 12 learning modules throughout the course, each on a different domains in cognition. Each module will contain a similar structure and give you multiple ways to engage with the content.

## Goals

- quick course orientation
- show you how learning modules will work
- get you ready for the first week

## Instructions

Work through each of the following sections:Read, Watch/listen, and React. There will be a short quiz on blackboard as a part of the React section. This should take 15-30 minutes.

## Read

Please take the time to read the [syllabus for this course](https://www.crumplab.com/cognition/articles/course_docs/Spring_2022_Psyc_2530_syllabus.html).

If you have questions about the syllabus, then please ask them on the blackboard discussion forum.

## Watch/Listen

This is a mini-lecture introducing you to the course.

You can also view the slide deck under the slides tab on the course website.

## React

When you are ready, take the short intro quiz on blackboard. You can find it in the getting started learning module.
